properties.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Owens Valley; Southern Clark County; Western Mojave Desert
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 29 at 10:24AM PST until January 29 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts over up to 50 mph
possible.

* WHERE...In Nevada, Southern Clark County. In California, Owens
Valley south of Independence, Western Mojave Desert and Eastern
Mojave Desert.

* WHEN...From 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ to 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...High profile vehicles will be susceptible to the
strong wind gusts this afternoon and could be blown off the
roadway or tipped over with the highest wind gusts. Some power
lines or trees may be blown down as well.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest possible impact is possible along
Highway 395 in Inyo County between Inyokern and Olancha. Wind
gusts could exceed 60 mph at times and result in blown over
semi-trucks and other high profile vehicles. Additionally,
strong wind gusts along Interstate 15 including Mountain Pass
and Barstow could see travel impacts including reduced
visibility due to blowing dust.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING
